text: Take Me to Hollywood (Spanish:Yo quiero que me lleven a Hollywood) is a 1931 Spanish comedy film directed by Edgar Neville, starring Perlita Greco. It was one of the earliest Spanish sound films.Labanyi & Pavlović, p. 374 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Labanyi, Jo & Pavlović, Tatjana. A Companion to Spanish Cinema. John Wiley & Sons, 2012. ==External links== * Category:1931 films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish comedy films Category:1931 comedy films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Edgar Neville Category:Spanish black-and-white films
title: Take Me to Hollywood
